casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Walic Christopher THOMAS. No. 435A96-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. Steven Bryant, Bryson City, for State of N.C. Marvin Sparrow, Raleigh, for Thomas, Walic Christopher. Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Durham, for Thomas, Walic Christopher. Walic C. Thomas, for Thomas, Walic Christopher. Jess D. Mekeel, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C. J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of October 2015 by Defendant to Authorize IDS to Appoint Substitute Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
